goal.en: The aim of the course is to explore certain common issues regarding education, social mobility, and wage labor.
goal.ch: 本課程主要探討關於教育，社會流動與受薪勞動等議題

content.en: To approach these issues critically, the course will divide the readings into three sections: capitalism and work, meritocracy, and finally the purpose of winning as in video games and life. At the end of each section, we will have group-led discussions on relevant issues so as to integrate learning and thinking. It is hoped that through this course students will mature critical aspirations and take a fresh perspective on many of the most common issues in the present world.
content.ch: 本課程內容主要分為三大類：資本主義與工作，菁英制度與遊戲中的輸贏與人生等議題。三大類別指定閱讀，將分別以小組討論方式整合學習與反思。

grading.en: in-class performance and assignment (25％); group project (30％); weekly group presentation (20％); final individual presentation (25％)
grading.ch: 課堂表現：25％ 團體報告：30％ 指定報告：20％ 個人報告：25％
